The espresso martinis are highly recommended for a delicious and creamy treat after some axe throwing. Engage with the staff as they provide helpful tips and techniques for throwing axes and ensuring a fun time. Enjoy the upbeat environment with music that keeps the energy high while competing with friends. Consider booking a private cage for parties or group events, as this is a fantastic way to celebrate any occasion. Click here to send a gift up to $1,000 with the suggestion to use it at Chops + Hops Axe Throwing Lodge. Is this your business? Claim your business to update business information, customize this listing, and more! Learn more about Chops + Hops Axe Throwing Lodge Price $$ Ambience Classy Year Established 2018 Hours Thursday: 4PM-12AM Friday: 4PM-2AM Saturday: 12PM-2AM Sunday: 12PM-12AM Chops + Hops Axe Throwing Lodge offers a unique blend of excitement and relaxation in Fort Lauderdale. This venue caters to both thrill-seekers and casual drinkers, featuring bright and welcoming spaces where guests can enjoy axe throwing under the guidance of skilled instructors. With an emphasis on creating a memorable experience, patrons can indulge in craft cocktails while enjoying friendly competition with friends or celebrating special occasions. Though food options may vary, guests can rely on a lively ambiance enriched by upbeat music and the camaraderie that comes from sharing the thrill of throwing axes. Whether it's a team-building event, a fun night out, or a date night, Chops + Hops provides a distinctive atmosphere and an enjoyable outing for everyone. Great Alternatives Gift $100 for Axe Habits : Axe Habits in Palmetto Bay offers a thrilling experience for axe throwing enthusiasts of all skill levels, making it the perfect destination for a fun and unique outing. Buy a Gift & Greeting Card for Delirium Axe Throwing : Delirium Axe Throwing in Miami delivers a thrilling and unique experience where customers can unleash their inner lumberjack while enjoying a fun-filled evening of axe throwing with friends and family.
